member.name: T:Slam.VisualStudio.Addin.Connect
member.summary: The object for implementing an Add-in.

member.name: M:Slam.VisualStudio.Addin.Connect.#ctor
member.summary: Implements the constructor for the Add-in object. Place your initialization code within this method.

member.name: M:Slam.VisualStudio.Addin.Connect.OnDisconnection(Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode,System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnDisconnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being unloaded.
member.param: Describes how the Add-in is being unloaded.
Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:Slam.VisualStudio.Addin.Connect.OnAddInsUpdate(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnAddInsUpdate method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification when the collection of Add-ins has changed.
member.param: Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:Slam.VisualStudio.Addin.Connect.OnStartupComplete(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnStartupComplete method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the host application has completed loading.
member.param: Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:Slam.VisualStudio.Addin.Connect.OnBeginShutdown(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnBeginShutdown method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the host application is being unloaded.
member.param: Array of parameters that are host application specific.
